Sql.query: select e.emprnomb as empresa, barrbarratransferencia as barra, equinomb as cliente, codentcodigo as codigo from trn_periodo p, trn_codigo_entrega c, vw_eq_central_generacion g, trn_barra b, vw_si_empresa e where c.equicodi = g.equicodi and c.barrcodi = b.barrcodi and c.emprcodi = e.emprcodi and c.codentestado = 'ACT' and p.pericodi = :pericodi and NVL(to_char(c.codentfechainicio, 'YYYYMM'), '000000') <= to_char(p.perianiomes) and NVL(to_char(c.codentfechafin, 'YYYYMM'), '999999') >= to_char(p.perianiomes) and c.codentcodi not in (select codentcodi from trn_trans_entrega t where c.codentcodi = t.codentcodi and t.pericodi = p.pericodi) union select e.emprnomb as empresa, barrbarratransferencia as barra, cl.emprnomb as cliente, tretcodigo as codigo from trn_periodo p, vw_trn_codigo_retiro c, vw_si_empresa e, trn_barra b, vw_si_empresa cl where c.genemprcodi = e.emprcodi and c.barrcodi = b.barrcodi and c.cliemprcodi = cl.emprcodi and p.pericodi = :pericodi and NVL(to_char(c.fechainicio, 'YYYYMM'), '000000') <= to_char(p.perianiomes) and NVL(to_char(c.fechafin, 'YYYYMM'), '999999') >= to_char(p.perianiomes) and (c.trettabla, c.tretcoresocoresccodi) not in (select trettabla, tretcoresocoresccodi from trn_trans_retiro t where c.trettabla = t.trettabla and c.tretcoresocoresccodi = t.tretcoresocoresccodi and t.pericodi = p.pericodi) order by 1, 2, 3

select emprnomb as empresa, barrbarratransferencia as barra, equinomb as cliente, codentcodigo as codigo,ev.emprcodi,codentfechainicio as fechainicio,codentfechafin as fechafin,'ENTREGA' as tipo from trn_periodo p, trn_codigo_entrega c, vw_eq_central_generacion g, trn_barra b, vw_si_empresa ev where c.equicodi = g.equicodi and c.barrcodi = b.barrcodi and c.emprcodi = ev.emprcodi and p.pericodi = :pericodi and (NVL(to_char(c.codentfechainicio, 'YYYYMM'), '000000') = to_char(p.perianiomes) or NVL(to_char(c.codentfechafin, 'YYYYMM'), '999999') = to_char(p.perianiomes)) and c.codentcodi in (select codentcodi from trn_trans_entrega t where c.codentcodi = t.codentcodi and t.pericodi = p.pericodi and t.tentversion=:version) union select e.emprnomb as empresa, barrbarratransferencia as barra, cl.emprnomb as cliente, tretcodigo as codigo, e.emprcodi,c.fechainicio,c.fechafin,'RETIRO' as tipo from trn_periodo p, vw_trn_codigo_retiro c, vw_si_empresa e, trn_barra b, vw_si_empresa cl where c.genemprcodi = e.emprcodi and c.barrcodi = b.barrcodi and c.cliemprcodi = cl.emprcodi and p.pericodi = :pericodi and (NVL(to_char(c.fechainicio, 'YYYYMM'), '000000') = to_char(p.perianiomes) or NVL(to_char(c.fechafin, 'YYYYMM'), '999999') = to_char(p.perianiomes)) and (c.trettabla, c.tretcoresocoresccodi) in (select trettabla, tretcoresocoresccodi from trn_trans_retiro t where c.trettabla = t.trettabla and c.tretcoresocoresccodi = t.tretcoresocoresccodi and t.pericodi = p.pericodi and t.tretversion = :version) union select emprnomb as empresa, barrbarratransferencia as barra, equinomb as cliente, coinfbcodigo as codigo,ev.emprcodi,coinfbfechainicio,coinfbfechafin,'INFOBASE' as tipo from trn_periodo p, trn_codigo_infobase c, vw_eq_central_generacion g, trn_barra b, vw_si_empresa ev where c.equicodi = g.equicodi and c.barrcodi = b.barrcodi and c.emprcodi = ev.emprcodi and p.pericodi = :pericodi and (NVL(to_char(c.coinfbfechainicio, 'YYYYMM'), '000000') = to_char(p.perianiomes) or NVL(to_char(c.coinfbfechafin, 'YYYYMM'), '999999') = to_char(p.perianiomes)) and c.coinfbcodi in (select coinfbcodi from trn_trans_infobase t where c.coinfbcodi = t.coinfbcodi and t.pericodi = p.pericodi and t.tinfbversion=:version) order by 1, 2, 3
